overview:
Karen Freedman is a long time physical therapist who specialized in neurological rehabilitation of adults and children and in pain management. In August 2000 when she and Dr. Freedman purchased AllMed she applied her vast experience with medical regulatory compliance to spearhead a successful accreditation of the company by a leading national accreditation company, URAC. AllMed has remained in good standing and successfully attained re-accreditation status for three years in 2004.

As Vice President of Professional Standards and HIPAA Officer, Ms. Freedman has the overall responsibility for the regulatory compliance program of AllMed, which encompasses reviewer credentialing, governmental compliance, accreditation standards compliance, Quality Management, and HIPAA compliance.
